projectGridLines.title: Title: Data-Driven Optimization and POS System Integration for D2C Operations
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Data-Driven Optimization and POS System Integration for D2C Operations


Description: This project focuses on integrating a POS system with Shopify for real-time inventory and sales synchronization, while setting up data pipelines and automation workflows to streamline operations. Students will configure both POS hardware and software, apply demand forecasting models, and enhance digital infrastructure to support Piharwaâ€™s D2C expansion. This role offers hands-on experience in e-commerce optimization, ideal for technically skilled students eager to make an impact.


Skill sets: 

  • POS System Setup and Integration (hardware configuration, network setup)
  • Data Analytics and Visualization (Python, SQL, Power BI)
  • Automation Scripting (Python, Zapier, Excel Macros)
  • E-commerce Platform Integration (Shopify backend, API usage)


Traits expectation: 

  • Technical problem-solving and analytical thinking
  • Attention to detail and adaptability in a fast-paced environment
  • Collaborative and proactive approach to integration and automation tasks



Expected learning: 


  • Practical skills in POS system integration and real-time data synchronization
  • Hands-on experience with e-commerce optimization and D2C operations
  • Exposure to automation workflows and predictive analytics in a retail setting


Specific courses required for project execution:  


  • Digital Communication
  • Digital Image Processing
